data.text: @MRYUKWA @waEMD Unfortunately no amount of education can effectively counter stupidity. Very sad.

@MRYUKWA When there were a few calls to poison control over alleged reactions to Ivermectin it was demonized. Maybe we should do the same for hand sanitizer and those Covid tests that contain sodium azide. Classic case of the solution being worse than the problem.

@MRYUKWA @WADeptHealth And now you are sending poison in the mail in the Covid 19 test kits. Each kit contains an extracting agent called sodium Azide. It is a liquid and highly poisonous in small amounts. Open up more testing sites in each city and start educating the public on these kits. https://t.co/cgJHlgFwAj
@MRYUKWA @WADeptHealth How could this have ever happened?  You clowns are 100% liable.
